transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Main Sunil Sunil Dutt Sharma bol raha hu Bhavnagar se.

Executive: Haan Sunil ji bol rahe ho sir. Main

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Namaskar Sunil ji, Amit baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaise hai aap sir?

Customer: Ji, ji, ji.

Executive: Ji ji. Kya hua sir?

Customer: Kar rahe the uske bare mein baat. Bhai sahab aap continue karo to jyada better rahega sir.

Customer: Mujhe bhi nikal jana hai bas.

Executive: Main aapko call karta hu sir, main thoda sa bahar tha abhi.

Customer: Haan haan koi baat nahi. Next time se mere sath dekhenge char chhe mahine ke baad agar kuch banega to sahi. Main contact karunga aapme.

Executive: Thik hai sir.

(silence)

Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to discuss something with the executive.

- Customer has to leave.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact the executive later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, follow-up, availability
